title: Survivor's Jonathan LaPaglia, 50, shares NAKED Instagram photo
text:
The latest Instagram challenge has seen Australian Survivor stars strip naked, with just a towel protecting their modesty.

And on Friday, host Jonathan LaPaglia outshone former contestants Shaun Hampson and David Genat, with his own eyebrow-raising photo.

The 50-year-old revealed his incredibly buff frame in his garage, with just a bottle of car engine oil concealing his private parts from view.

Anything you can do! Australian Survivor host Jonathan LaPaglia (pictured), 50, outshone AFL star Shaun Hampson, with his own NAKED Instagram photo on Friday

Jonathan held a spanner in his right hand, and showed off a fierce gaze while pretending to work on his vehicle.

Tagging Survivor stars who gave the #goldentowelchallenge a red hot shot, the actor wrote in the caption: 'Pfffft..... #goldentowelchallenge??

'While you guys are busy posing, I'm here working hard. I challenge you guys to the #changemyoilchallenge.'

Fans flocked to the comments section, praising Jonathan with the likes of 'that's so brilliant' and 'this just escalated'.

Antics: On Wednesday, Shaun (pictured), 31, took part in the #goldentowelchallenge, which kicked off after Survivor star David Genat posed with just a towel protecting his modesty

Shaun, 31, joked that he's suddenly now 'bi-curious' while Moana Hope, 31, who also completed the challenge, questioned why he was wearing gloves in the photo.

The shenanigans all kicked off on Monday when Survivor model-turned-villain David Genat posted a snap of himself wearing nothing but a strategically-placed towel.

He captioned the photo: 'I have had the privilege of working with the best of the best over my career and this towel was no exception... Oh, also thanks to the legend @Mario Testino. Just the best photographer in the world, no big deal.'

Having a laugh: Fellow Survivor star Johnny Eastoe (pictured) took part in the challenge on Tuesday

On Tuesday, former Survivor star Johnny Eastoe decided to strip off, letting it all hang out, followed by Shaun on Wednesday.

In Shaun's cheeky black and white photo, the sportsman showed off a whole other side to him as he rested his leg on his spa bath and took in entertainment stalwart Richard Wilkins' gripping memoir, Black Ties, Red Carpets, Green Rooms.

The handsome hunk captioned the snap: 'Thought I'd tick off the #goldentowelchallenge and some light reading at the same time.'
description: He's the host of Australian Survivor and is known for his incredibly lean figure.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
